channel.title: Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Lecture Notes on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Lecture Notes
item.description: The course notes correspond to chapters from the course textbook: Tamhane, Ajit C., and Dorothy D. Dunlop. Statistics and Data Analysis: From Elementary to Intermediate. Prentice Hall, 1999. ISBN: 9780137444267. CHAPTERS TITLES NOTES 2 Review of Probability (PDF) 3 Collecting Data (PDF) 4 Summarizing and Exploring Data (PDF) 5 Sampling Distributions of Statistics (PDF) 6 Basic Concepts of Inference (PDF) (PDF) (PDF) 7 Inferences for Single Samples (PDF) 8 Inferences for Two Samples (PDF) 9 Inferences for Proportions and Count Data (PDF)

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt02.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on review of probability.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt03.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on collecting data.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt04.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on summarizing and exploring data.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt05.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on sampling distributions of statistics.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt06a.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on confidence intervals.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt06b.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on mean-squared error (MSE).

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt06c.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on hypothesis testing, hypothesis testing, and alternative hypothesis.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt07.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on inferences for single samples.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt08.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on inferences for two samples.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt09a.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on inference for proportion and count data, comparing 2 proportions.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt09b.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on inference for one way count data Chi-Square Test using the multinomial distribution.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt09c.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on inferences for two way count data.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt10.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on similar linear regression and correlation.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt11.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on multiple linear regression.

item.title: MIT15_075JF11_chpt14.pdf
item.description: This resource contains information on nonparametric statistical methods.
